title: Provide Input for Matrix Generation
content:
The input files must confirm to this format.

Use one of the three ways to provide the input:

  • If you don't have files in that format, you can
  • If you have files in that format on your local computer, Upload input files
  • If you have files generated by Text Capture on ETC site, Use an existing folder

title: Create Input Files
content: If you don't have files in the required format, first run Text Capture to generate such files

title: Upload Input Files
content:
If you have files in the required format on your local computer, use Upload input files option.
  1. Prepare the folder for the uploads by one of the two ways:
    • create a new folder
    • select an existing folder
  2. Click on Upload input files button

title: Select an Existing Folder
content:
If you have files in the required format on ETC site, use Select Existing Folder option.

Click on Select Folder to select a Text Capture output folder, which has '_output_by_TC_' in the folder name.
